abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Igdir-Aksu Eregli-Ercis
            (IAEE) Irrigation Project in Turkey are as follows: overall
            outcome of the project was rated as satisfactory, the
            performance of the Bank was rated poor, and the performance
            of the Borrower was rated as unsatisfactory. Some of the
            lessons learned from the project are: 1) investment projects
            that are heavily focused on physical components, fail to
            address the root causes of the problems facing the sector.
            Greater focus on institutional and policy issues when these
            stand in the way of efficiency is warranted; 2) the use of
            country and sector-specific disbursement profiles would
            result in a more realistic implementation period for any
            irrigation project; 3) the availability and reliability of
            water supply has to be critically assessed at appraisal and
            the command area sized accordingly, to avoid situations
            similar to Eregli; 4) delays in project implementation can
            be curtailed by closer cooperation and coordination between
            participating agencies, but this requires developing
            appropriate arrangements during preparation; 6)
            establishment of Water Users Organization (WUOs) and making
            them responsible for management, is a major positive step
            for assuring the sustainability of an irrigation project; 7)
            creation of a monitoring and evaluation (M&E) unit in
            General Directorate of State Hydraulic Works (DSI) and
            expansion of its existing environmental unit would
            contribute substantially to a quality analysis of the impact
            and to the planning of irrigation schemes; and 8) the
            measurement of irrigation efficiencies is vital to assess
            the performance of irrigation schemes.

18218913.admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

repnme.cdata!:
Turkey - Igdir - Aksu - Eregli - Ercis
            (IAEE) Irrigation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Igdir-Aksu-Eregli-Ercis (IAEE)
            Irrigation Project supports the Government's efforts to
            accelerate completion of priority irrigation schemes. Four
            subprojects have been selected: Igdir, Aksu, Eregli and
            Ercis (IAEE) and for each the project will assist in
            financing: (i) completion of irrigation and drainage
            infrastructure; (ii) on-farm development works; (iii)
            strengthening of the extension system; (iv) operation and
            maintenance equipment; and (v) staff training. The project
            will also include preparation of an irrigation investment
            master plan and strategy review.
